prompts: Create a snake-like Pokemon with a purple body and a yellow accent.
Imagine a Pokemon that can camouflage in grasslands and forests.
Show me a serpentine creature that uses poison in battles.
Generate a Pokemon that embodies cunning and stealth in its design.
Design a creature that slithers through urban areas, evoking a sense of danger.
Make a Pokemon with a sleek, elongated shape and a fierce expression.
Give me a visual representation of a sneaky, purple snake Pokemon.
